TopicTitle: 3rd Attempt To Ask For Help Making KSP Cinematic

Articles.Content:
So this is the 3rd time I've come back to the Fan Works section asking for help turning one of two of my stories into a cinematics, but twice over it failed. For one reason or another, the one recording the video had to bail out. I once asked someone, but he got busy with life and left after a very promising start. Alternatively I had someone else help, someone who I work with in another KSP project but the project and his own life again prevented it from happening. Lastly for those who are wondering, I can't record it myself as my setup is too weak. I've got story, I've got ideas and all, just no methods of doing it.

The stories I have in mind are ; Recover Vessel, and another dramatic story (will explain if your interested).

So if you would like to give it a shot and help, please, please, please let me know.

Thanks everyone for reading.
Just for an update; I might have someone who's up for doing the video editing if you arnt up for it. Just need someone to design the sets and recording the actual video.
@ZooNamedGames, I'm wondering what the story is about. I'm wondering if you gave me a plotline if I could do anything.

5 minutes ago, DMSP said:

@ZooNamedGames, I'm wondering what the story is about. I'm wondering if you gave me a plotline if I could do anything.

I'll pm you in a bit the storyline.
